title: Digital Transformation Strategy Design for Corporate Technical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Episode-Based Case Studies Reflecting Collaboration with Learning Development Teams in Manufacturing Companies

learning_goals: Learners can explain the digital tool utilization skills training program design process in three or more stages.
Learners can collaborate with team members in a smartphone-based PBL environment to produce digital educational content prototypes.
Learners can develop five or more interview questions for analyzing digital learning acceptance among corporate practitioners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
